hero.title: Hi, I'm Sakin!
hero.des0: I'm a Software Developer with a keen focus on crafting cutting-edge web applications.
hero.des1: I love collaborating in teams to create high-quality and sophisticated software.
hero.des2: Though I'm always open to adjust to any tech stacks but my preferred web stack involves React, NodeJS and TypeScript.
hero.des3: I'm currently learning more about backend engineering and networking.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my favourite projects that I've lead and developed collaborating with a team or alone. Most of the projects were build to address real-world scenarios.

cms.description: A social media flabored citizens complaints management system

redditTimify.subtitle: Reddit Timify

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: While I eagerly embrace any latest technologies, the following tools have consistently proven their worth in every project I undertake.

experience.title: Experience

contact.title: Want to connect?
